title: Horror Music Box
description: A collection of 13 original horror music soundtracks with very high quality sinths and orchestral sounds
longDescription:
HORROR MUSIC BOX

A collection of 13 original horror soundtracks with very high quality sinths


One of the most important things in a horror game is atmosphere. sound and music play a fundamental role in this. 


Enjoy this fine pack with 13 original horror soundtracks made by real musicians with expensive sinths, mixed and mastered in a recording studio with brands like universal and adam audio. Composed and mixed in ProTools this pack garanties a creepy enviroment that you need for your game.
